title: (x) flourished script used in Martha's new mag Blueprint\* - Fling {Patricia}
content:
Hi - I am not sure if this is a custom font that was designed exclusively for the magazine, but I would love to hear any reccomendations of scripty fonts that have a similar look. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [blueprint.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629075159/http:/typophile.com/files/blueprint.gif) | 2.78 KB |

 [‹ (x) "Silver" wide hand printed script - Ankeny {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629075159/http:/typophile.com/node/19588 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Genuine wooden type blocks - similar to Knockout, Balboa {Chris K, Alessandro} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629075159/http:/typophile.com/node/19591 "Go to next forum topic")
author: laurabachman

comments.content: Chris, look at the next thread! Mike slipped in there ahead of both of us.
